attributes.action: stop fraudulent charities from operating around Calais
attributes.background:
There are a number of fake charities operating around Calais in defiance of the government of France, They encourage illegal immigration to the UK.

 They are not registered with the charities commission but use other chairty numbers to solicit donations.

 This must end.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the authorities in France, not the UK Government or Parliament.
